column1: Ur kkat ara di lɛib ma twalaḍ-t.
Ḥemmleɣ iḍrisen n Muḥend u Yeḥya.
Isuqqel-d Muḥya Samuel Beckett ɣer teqbaylit.

column2: llan wid i s-isemman « asennan n uɣyul ».

column1: Wissen ma tezṛiḍ amek tettaffeg zerriɛa n tuɣmest n temɣart.
D agellid n teɣrast n tzizwa i yettarwen.
Skenfeɣ-d tacṛiḥt n uksum ɣef yirrij.
Yemma ɛezzu txeddem isura s wulman.
Akken ad iyi-yekkes ṣṣiḥ n uqerru
Iɣelli-d udfel am tkulal n taduṭ .
Ajgagal n tẓurin yuli ɣef teslent.
Ilul Frantz Fanon di 20 yulyu 1925 di Maṛtinik.
Yettunefk waraz Goncourt n useggas 2019 i Jean-Paul Dubois .
Lewnis n At Mangellat yuder-d Wezna di tezlitt.
Ferḥat Mhenni yuder-d isaffen n tament akk d wudi deg yiwet n tezlitt.
« Leḥjab n tḥerrit » d azwel n yiwet seg tezlatin n Crif Xeddam.
Ma twala tyaziṭ i d-yestebɛen icwecwen tasiwant deg yigenni
Ufiɣ argaz la ineǧǧeṛ afus i tqabact.
Yuɣ-d Bussaɛd aḥuli ɣer nanna-s Lǧuheṛ.
Ur ḥemmleɣ ara iselman n wasif.
Sewwen-d uftiyen asmi tkecmeḍ s aɣerbaz.
Tigzirt d tiɣremt ɣef rrif n Yilel agrakal.
Tom ttaqrib yeldi-d tawwurt-nni ur nlaq ara.
D kem i d tameṭṭut n tirga-w.
Llant teltalaf n tbariyin n ccṛab deg lbabuṛ-agi.
D nekkini kan i d-yessasen ṭlima..
Ur ɛlimeɣ ara belli tzemreḍ i wannect-a n leḥsan.
Tom yenna-yi-d iḍ ameggaz dɣa iṛuḥ.
Tom yettaεṛaḍ akk s wayen yezmer.
D leḥbab neɣ teffɣen kan lwaḥid?
Yella wayen nniḍen i bɣiɣ ad k-d-iniɣ.
Yella wayen nniḍen i bɣiɣ ad m-d-iniɣ.
Yella wayen nniḍen i bɣiɣ ad wen-d-iniɣ.
Yella wayen nniḍen i bɣiɣ ad kent-id-iniɣ.
Wissen ma telliḍ tezṛiḍ teddun-d ɣer dagi ass-a?
Ur zmirɣ ad ttuɣ ass deg i d-mlaleɣ Tom.
Acḥal n texxamin i yesɛa Tom deg tnezduɣt-is?
D lawan n ujmaɛ d ukmas.
Ur zṛiɣ ara acimi ulac-it dagi ass-s.
